name: Specific CSS/JS for Posts and Pages
author: Carlos Leopoldo Maga√±a Zavala

sections.description:
Specific CSS/JS for Posts and Pages is a plugin that allows you to add custom CSS or Javascript files or embeded code in header to individual posts or pages.

Plugin’s Official Site

Specific CSS/JS for Posts and Pages

Major features in Specific CSS/JS for Posts and Pages include:

  • You can add multiples CSS files to indivual posts or pages
  • You can add multiples Javascript files to indivual posts or pages
  • Also you can add CSS or Javascript code directly between header tags in posts or pages

Translations

  • English
  • Spanish
  • New translations are welcomed

For more information please visit us at Specific CSS/JS for Posts and Pages plugin page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload specific-cssjs-for-posts-and-pages folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory in your blog
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Then you can change some options through the ‘Settings’ menu in WordPress
  4. You’re done!
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with “Specific CSS/JS for Posts and Pages”?

Support
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Fixed some bugs with undefined variables
  • Added spanish translation

0.9

  • Fixed some bugs in settings page
  • Added support for translations

short_description: With Specific CSS/JS for Posts and Pages you can add CSS or JavaScript files to a specific page or post.
